room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Treasure" by Denver Escapes in Charlotte
review: We did the Blackbeard's Revenge room. Good clues, fun room!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Treasure" by Denver Escapes in Charlotte
review: Did the Black Beard's Treasure room. We didn't win but we had a blast. Puzzles were clever and interesting and the attendant was there listening and offering us hints if we were willing to use them.I think I was a bit too stingy on the hints. If I had used them as a part of the puzzle itself and managed them, maybe we would have won? Not sure, but my wife and I had a great time anyways!
